summary: Comprehensive testing of updated quiz app with new character images, removed carousel dots, no 'Quiz Time' label, and full analytics result page with reveal animation, character images (1-10), heart rating, percentile, radar chart, and positive/negative traits

minor_issues.issue: Backend returns different pati_rating format than frontend expects
minor_issues.details: Backend returns 'ADITYA ðŸ’«' but frontend expects 'Aapka pati is like Aditya from Jab We Met'
minor_issues.impact: Frontend correctly displays proper titles from resultData.js, so no user impact

minor_issues.issue: Reveal animation not consistently detected in automated tests
minor_issues.details: Animation may complete too quickly or timing issues in test detection
minor_issues.impact: Animation works in manual testing but automated detection is inconsistent

passed_tests: Landing page displays 10 character images in carousel
Landing page has no carousel dots (correctly removed)
Carousel auto-transitions between images every 3.5 seconds
Quiz instructions page has no 'Quiz Time' label (correctly removed)
Quiz instructions shows heart icon and 'How to Play' content
Quiz has 15 questions with YES/NO buttons
Quiz navigation works correctly through all questions
Result page shows character image based on score (1-10)
Result page displays correct title and trait cards
Heart rating displays correctly (8/10 hearts filled)
Percentile section shows 'Your husband is better than X% of husbands'
Radar chart displays 5 categories with proper data
Positive traits section shows top strengths
Areas to improve section shows weaknesses
Backend correctly stores score_1_to_10 and percentile
Retake Quiz button navigates back to instructions
Home button navigates back to landing page
All backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Backend correctly calculates scores and percentiles
Frontend-backend integration working properly
